mapper.select: SELECT SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(ODATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD'), 6, 2) AS MM, SUM(O.OCOUNT * P.PPRICE) AS REVENUE FROM "ORDER" O JOIN PRODUCT P ON O.PID = P.PID WHERE SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(ODATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD'), 1, 4) = #{year} GROUP BY SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(ODATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD'), 6, 2) ORDER BY MM ASC
SELECT CID, SUM(PSALES) AS SALES FROM PRODUCT GROUP BY CID ORDER BY CID ASC

SELECT SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(ODATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD'), 6, 2) AS MM, COUNT(OID) AS CNT FROM "ORDER" WHERE SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(ODATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD'), 1, 4) = #{year} GROUP BY SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(ODATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD'), 6, 2) ORDER BY MM ASC

SELECT P.PID, C.CNAME, P.PNAME, P.PIMAGE, TO_CHAR(P.PPRICE, '999,999,999') AS PRICECHAR, P.PPRICE AS PRICENUM, P.PSALES, P.PSTOCK, P.PLINK FROM PRODUCT P JOIN CATEGORY C ON P.CID = C.CID
AND P.PNAME LIKE '%'||#{searchword}||'%'
AND P.CID = #{category}
ORDER BY PRICENUM DESC, P.PID DESC
ORDER BY PRICENUM ASC, P.PID DESC
ORDER BY P.PSALES DESC, P.PID DESC
ORDER BY P.PSALES ASC, P.PID DESC
ORDER BY P.PSTOCK DESC, P.PID DESC
ORDER BY P.PSTOCK ASC, P.PID DESC
ORDER BY P.PID DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE PRODUCT SET PNAME = #{pname}, PIMAGE = #{pimage}, PPRICE = #{pricenum}, PSTOCK = NVL(#{pstock}, 0), PLINK = #{plink} WHERE PID = #{pid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT (PID, CID, PNAME, PIMAGE, PPRICE, PSTOCK, PLINK) VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(PID), 0)+1 FROM PRODUCT), #{cid}, #{pname}, #{pimage}, #{pricenum}, NVL(#{pstock}, 0), #{plink})
